title: A very bold slab serif font
content:
I was wondering what slab serif font is used for this poster: [http://www.conservativehome.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Miliband-and-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317060011/http:/www.conservativehome.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Miliband-and-Salmond.png "http://www.conservativehome.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/01/Miliband-and-Salmond.png")

The bottom font I know, that's Open Sans.

Thank you!

Font: 

 Stag
